issue.title: mixing up versions
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

I create a new Version of a geoproduct and its children (successful).
In the list of resources, I choose the second last Version of the geoproduct (Status = published). Then I want to see the list of children of this particular Version, but I get the list of the latest Versions of children (Status = in Arbeit).

Obviously the Versions get mixed up, or, after choosing the Version of the geoproducht (parent), the list of children is not updated...

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.7
